name: dohjs
description: DNS over HTTPS lookups from web apps

scripts.build: npm run dohjs && npm run doh-elems
scripts.dohjs: browserify lib/index.js --standalone doh -o dist/doh.js && npx terser dist/doh.js --compress --mangle --output=dist/doh.min.js
scripts.doh-elems: browserify lib/elements/doh-elem-utils.js lib/elements/doh-script-elem.js lib/elements/doh-style-elem.js -o dist/doh-elems.js && npx terser dist/doh-elems.js --compress --mangle --output=dist/doh-elems.min.js
